definition: lit. minor magician in the presence of a great one (idiom)/fig. to pale into insignificance by comparison
small/tiny/few/young
witch/wizard/shaman/also pr. [wu2]
surname Wu/also pr. [Wu2]
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
witch/wizard/shaman/also pr. [wu2]
surname Wu/also pr. [Wu2]

sentences.english: Our greenhouse is nothing compared with yours.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个温室比起你们那个简直是小巫见大巫。

sentences.english: That's nothing compared to what I have to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 但比起我所经受的可是小巫见大巫。

sentences.english: By comparison, the cost of American illusions pales.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，美国幻想的代价就是小巫见大巫了。

definition: lit. one hair from nine oxen (idiom)/fig. a drop in the ocean
not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: pediatrics/pediatric (department)/sth of little importance/trifle/a child's play/(slang) childish/petty/stingy
inferior/not up to par/to fall far short/to be mistaken
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: not inferior in any respect
equally matched/about the same
a complete contrast/totally different
to discuss two disparate things together (idiom); to mention on equal terms/to place on a par with/(often with negatives: impossible to mention X in the same breath as Y)
as different as heaven and earth (idiom)/worlds apart
lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
lit. to speak of two things on the same day (idiom); to mention things on equal terms (often with negatives: you can't mention X at the same time as Y)
no less than/not inferior to
comparable
